title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group, without setting the dataset.
EB:
Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a table report item to the template.
2. Do not set the dataset for the table.
3. Try to create a new table group.
4. Verify that the user is able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
